name: The Many Marvelous Mazes of P is for Phoenix
name_original: The Many Marvelous Mazes of P is for Phoenix
description: This puzzle package contains 26 beautifully illustrated mazes based on the fantasy and mythological creatures found in the book P is for Phoenix. Anwser keys are included just in case the younger set are doing these mazes. Puzzles are available in 24,48,70 and 96 piece sizes.
